---

sidebar:

---

import Npm from '@/components/npm.astro';

By default package `@sjsf/form` comes with a basic theme.

## Usage

```svelte
<script lang="ts">
  import { Form } from "@sjsf/form";
  import { theme } from '@sjsf/form/basic-theme';
</script>

<Form {...theme} />
```
